name: Crowdy
description: Crowdy is a decentralized dApp builder (DDB) with an IDO platform included that is genuinely decentralized and blockchain agnostic. Without any programming experience, anyone can launch their token, design their project, add new modules such as pools, farms, vaults, swaps and many more tools provided by Crowdy. No coding skills are required; simply navigate through our interface, create your project, raise investment and design it until you achieve the DeFi product you always wanted. At Crowdy we believe in the decentralization and democratization of technology and that is why we have made Web 3.0 tools available to everyone. Crowdy is at the forefront of decentralized development.
